document_notes.text:
This update for apr-util fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-25147: Fixed a buffer overflow possible with specially crafted input during base64 encoding (bsc#1207866)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in apr_base64 functions of Apache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util) allows an attacker to write beyond bounds of a buffer. This issue affects Apache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util) 1.6.1 and prior versions.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
